result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Logan Paul Perusse

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on October 24, 2022 at 11:15 am.

11:05 AM Defendant Logan Paul Perusse in court.  Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video for Logan Paul Perusse.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls cases.  PLEAS set for today.  Atty Brewer is new on cases.   DA to provide discovery.  Parties request PTC.  10/24 at 11:15 a.m.  Atty Brewer requests bonds to be converted to signature and bond to be refunded.  Court releases bond in 22CF12.  Keeps bond in other two cases.  Def to sign new bond.  Adj.  11:11 a.m.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 19, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 9:01 a.m. Defendant Logan Paul Perusse appeared by video.  Attorney Ralph David Imholte appeared by video for Logan Paul Perusse.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls all cases and cites appearances.  Per counsel, agreement has been reached.  Request 2 week adjournment.  State requests def to be present in person.  10/19 at 11:00 a.m.  Adj.  9:04 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:02 a.m.  Court calls cases.  Atty Ralph Imholt appears via Zoom for Def who appears via Zoom audio.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  DA requests STC or PLEAS in late Sept.  9/27 at 9:00 a.m. for PLEAS.  Def can appear via Zoom but must be with video.  Adj.  10:07 a.m.  klr
Status conference on July 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:33 p.m. Defendant Logan Paul Perusse in court with attorney Ralph David Imholte.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Per Atty Imholte, complaint has been received and def waives reading.  Def waives prelim.  Court goes through waiver and finds def freely waives.  No info available at this time but per DA, Info will mirror complaint.  State to file Info.  ARGN:  Def pleads NG per Atty Imholte.  Per DA, PTC has been held in all cases set for today.  PTC to be set in 45 days.  July 13, 2022 at 10:00 a.m.  Adj.  klr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on May 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:28 A.M.  Court calls cases, cites appearances.  Atty Ralph Imholte appears via Zoom on behalf of def.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Def appears in person, in custody.  21CF35 and 21CF38 are at ARGN stage.  22CF12 is at initial appearance stage.  Atty Imholte states he wasn't appointed yet on 22CF12.  Def will apply for public def on that case.  Atty asks for adjournment on 22CF12.  DA requests cash bond of $500 cash.  Court proceeds to other two cases.  Atty Imholte said we can proceed on these.  In 21CF35, Def enters plea of NG.  Schedule for PTC.  In 21CF38, Def enters plea of NG.  PTs set for 1:15 on May 25.  IA on 22CF12 to be set for May 25 at 1:30 p.m.  In Case 21CF35, $100 cash bond already.  DA:  Requests $500 cash be spread among all cases.  Bond of $250 cash in 22CF12, $100 cash bond in 21CF35, $150 cash bond set in 21CF38.  Court sets bonds as requested.  Court warns def he must show up for cases.  Adj.  10:40 a.m.  klr

ADDRESS INFO for Logan Paul Perusse
Current: 46 Michigan Ave, Montreal, WI 54550 United States  (Effective: 03-24-2022)
Prior: 45 Michigan Ave, Montreal, WI 54550 United States

Court calls 21CF35, 38, and 22CF12.  Atty Imholte represents def on 35 and 38 (set for ARGN).  No atty appointed on 22CF12 (set for an IA.)  Def fails to appear.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Atty Imholte indicates is unable to reach client.  Mail in court file has been returned, per Court.  DA requests warrant.  Body only warrant is authorized.  Adj.  10:49 a.m.  klr
Initial appearance on April 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
